channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Equivariant K-theoretic enumerative invariants and wall-crossing formulae in abelian categories
item.description: arXiv:2207.13546v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We provide a general framework for wall-crossing of equivariant K-theoretic enumerative invariants of appropriate moduli stacks $\mathfrak{M}$, by lifting Joyce's homological universal wall-crossing arXiv:2111.04694 to K-theory and to include equivariance. The primary new tool is that the operational K-homology of $\mathfrak{M}$ is an equivariant multiplicative vertex algebra.
item.dc:creator: Henry Liu

item.title: Multiplicative vertex algebras and quantum loop algebras
item.description: arXiv:2210.04773v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We define a multiplicative version of vertex coalgebras and show that various equivariant K-theoretic constructions of Hall algebras (KHAs) also admit a compatible multiplicative vertex coalgebra structure. In particular, this is true of the preprojective KHA of Varagnolo--Vasserot, which is (conjecturally) isomorphic to certain quantum loop algebras.
item.dc:creator: Henry Liu

item.title: Quasihomomorphisms, split exactness and operator homotopy in KK
item.description: arXiv:2410.20125v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We develop important properties of the KK-functor on the basis of split exactness.
item.dc:creator: Joachim Cuntz
